channel.title: Psudo-EoC Server
channel.description:
A while back my friends and I stopped working on a server with abilities on it, but are now thinking of starting back up. I just want to know how many people are interested in playing a psudo-EoC server.
Server will include: - Re-balanced 317 combat triangle (still keeps 317 item stats/bonuses) - 317 attack speeds (no ability spam :D) - Special Attacks (starting at 100%) - Abilities (only 6 can be used at a time) - Up-gradable abilities (to higher tiers) - Open world team pvp (decide to join Saradomin or Zamorak)
Server may include: - Increased HP - Bosses that can only be killed with certain abilities
Server will [b]NOT[/b] include: - EoC combat level calculation - Stuns (yeah I hate them too) - Basic, threshold, ultimate ability system - Tier system - Adrenalin
To clear up bosses: Our reason for making bosses that require abilities to kill is that when we had a beta open we got tons of good feedback on the pvp aspect, but npcs were too easy to kill. What I have in mind for bosses is something like a boss that prepares to use a massive attack at lets say 25% health. If it hits you, you will be left with 1 hp, however if you use an ability called reflect it will kill the boss.
Post any and all questions, I will be answering as many as I can.

item.title: Psudo-EoC Server
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:5, topic:539726”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=658566.msg4405066#msg4405066 date=1391680631]
I’d play it as long as the fundamental parts of combat are the same.
[/quote]
This

and i dislike

- Bosses that can only be killed with certain abilities[/quote]

Well as I said before the server may include them, but we are always willing to change based on feedback so who knows you might like them.

Also the fundamental parts of combat are the same it’s just like having 6 extra special attacks that are on timers (usually 30 seconds to 1 minute)

Read full topic

kronikz:

“general” server discussion

Read full topic
